actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dogmole makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Burrowed Tunnels
special_abilities.desc: If the dogmole burrows at half its burrowing speed, it can leave a 5-foot diameter tunnel in its wake.
